Description: General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API
CWE: CWE-770 Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling
Vulnerability: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered jackson-databind thru 2.15.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts via crafted object that uses cyclic dependencies. NOTE: the vendor's perspective is that the product is not intended for use with untrusted input.
